testcase.name: User Creation
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to hackthebox home page................................passed When user clicks For Individuals button.....................................passed Then user clicks Join for free button.......................................passed And user enter valid e mail address then sign up button.....................passed And user enter valid password then click continue button....................passed And user enter valid username...............................................passed And user enter valid fullname...............................................passed And user select country.....................................................passed And user enter valid date of birth..........................................passed And user click user agreement and the privacy notice check box..............passed And user clicks create account button.......................................passed And verify pending e mail verification alert................................passed And user open verification email and verify e mail address link.............passed And verify user account created.............................................passed
